title: wtf is happening to the damm fuckin clint
body: i got band for 15 mins becuase this fucked up clinet losses connection every 2 minuts and i cant even accept cuase it doenst show it to me , so enogh tries and here you go , i cant play with my friends like this , we cant fuckin play toghether , i think of quiting until dis sht gets fixed , its not worth it

replies.body: Failing to accept a match consistantly can result in a [dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) penalty for the account.  If this issue is still happening then your network might be having problems transitioning into champion select and leaving you behind.  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
